options.systemMessage:
=You are a logistics assistant for a transportation company. 

Your job is to extract all structured data from shipping request emails sent by customers (typically retail chains like E.Leclerc). These emails contain information about the sender, shipment pickup and delivery details.

Return the result as a JSON object with the following fields:

{
  "shipment_number": "",
  "pickup_location": "",
  "pickup_address": "",
  "expected_pickup_time": "",
  "temperature_control": "",
  "quantity": "",
  "destination_store_name": "",
  "destination_address": "",
  "expected_delivery_time": "",
  "sender_name": "",
  "sender_company": ""
}

Only include values mentioned explicitly in the email. Do not infer or guess. If a field is missing, set its value to `null`.

=You are a logistics assistant working for a transportation company. Your job is to write polite and professional response confirming shipment planification to retail customers. Your tone should be clear, efficient, and customer-friendly. Keep it concise and formal. The confirmation must repeat the key shipment details to avoid confusion and should reassure the customer that the transport has been scheduled. Do not invent details ‚Äî only use the provided data. The email must be in **English**. ‚ö†Ô∏è Always format the result in **HTML**, not plain text or Markdown. Use proper HTML tags like `

`, ``, `
`, and `

  • ` where needed. You do not need to add a subject, just the body. About you [Name]: LogiGreen Bot [Position]: Transportation Planner [Company]: LogiGreen Transportation [Contact]: logigreenbot@gmail.com

parameters.content:
### 3. Record Shipment Request Information and fetch distance and driving time using Open Route API
This starts by recording all the information parsed by the AI node. Then, we use the **Open Route API** to complete with **geocoding data** *(GPS Coordinates)* that will be used to fetch **driving distance and time**.

#### How to setup?
- **Setup API Credentials**
  1. Get your free API key: [Open Route API Documentation](https://openrouteservice.org/dev/#/api-docs)
  2. Fill the API key in the HTTP request node
  3. Select the driving mode (**driving-car**: individual truck) or (**driving-hgv**: commercial truck)
- **Load records in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record your working sessions
   4. Map the fields: **shipment_number**, **pickup_location**, **pickup_address**, **pickup_longitude**, **pickup_latitude**, **expected_pickup_time**,	**temperature_control**, **destination_store_name**, **destination_address**, **destination_longitude**, **destination_latitude**, **expected_delivery_time**, **driving_distance**, **driving_time**													
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)

Longitudes, latitudes, distance and time will be fetched from the **Open Route API**.

### 1. Workflow Trigger with Gmail Trigger
The workflow is triggered by a new email received in your Gmail mailbox dedicated to process **shipment request**.

#### How to setup?
- **Gmail Trigger Node:** set up your Gmail API credentials
[Learn more about the Gmail Trigger Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmailtrigger)

### 2. AI Agent to parse shipment information from email
This node will analyze the content of the email to extract information about the **sender** *(name, company)* and the **shipment** *(departure, arrival, timing and locations)*.

#### How to setup?
- **AI Agent with the Chat Model**:
   1. Add a **chat model** with the required credentials *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt to the format of emails you expect to receive *(type of information included)*
  [Learn more about the AI Agent Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent)

### 4. Reply with a confirmation of shipment allocation
We first collect all the information from the **Google Sheets** that will be used by the AI Agent to generate a reply by email.
#### How to setup?
- **Load records in the Google Sheet Node**:
   1. Add your Google Sheet API credentials to access the Google Sheet file
   2. Select the file using the list, an URL or an ID
   3. Select the sheet in which you want to record your working sessions											
  [Learn more about the Google Sheet Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets)
- **AI Agent with the Chat Model**:
   1. Add a **chat model** with the required credentials *(Example: Open AI 4o-mini)*
   2. Adapt the system prompt with your company information **(name, contact, position)**
  [Learn more about the AI Agent Node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent)
